comment: The trace, over a set ` A ` , of the filter of the neighborhoods of a point ` P ` is a filter iff ` P ` belongs to the closure of ` A ` . (This is ~ trfil2 applied to a filter of neighborhoods.) (Contributed by FL, 15-Sep-2013.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)
